name: Azhad Batt
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: CRYPTO-TRACKER
projects.description: Led the development and deployment of Crypto-X, a comprehensive web application for tracking and analyzing cryptocurrency trends, ensuring real-time data accuracy and user-friendly design.

projects.name: CHROME-EXTENSION
projects.description: Designed and deployed a Chrome extension for displaying random dad jokes, enhancing user engagement and entertainment while browsing. Managed the projects front-end using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring seamless integration with the Chrome browser and maintaining user-friendly functionality.

projects.name: 3D-SHIRT MODEL
projects.description: Developed an interactive 3D model viewer using Three.js and React, allowing users to customize 3D shirts in real-time. Deployed the project on Vercel, ensuring smooth performance and accessibility, while integrating Tailwind CSS for a responsive and visually appealing design.

experiences.description: Developed a fully functional website from scratch using React, including components, state management, and user interactions. Add many features like Newsletter integration and whatsapp integration.
